AIStrategy.Name: WaitsForInstruction
AIStrategy.Description: Plays as proxy for a human. A UI is needed to communicate the human's intentions.

AIStrategy.Name: Random
AIStrategy.Description: Choice from a random selection amongst available cells

AIStrategy.Name: PlayInMiddleIfAvailable
AIStrategy.Description: If there are no other winning strategies, play in the middle cell

AIStrategy.Name: WinIfPossible
AIStrategy.Description: If any two cells are already filled in by the AI, and the 3rd cell in that row is available, play there.

AIStrategy.Name: PreventWinIfPossible
AIStrategy.Description: Prevent opponent from using WinIfPossible strategy

AIStrategy.Name: ForceWinNextTurn
AIStrategy.Description: Check for a move that will force a win the next turn, regardless of what the opponent does.

AIStrategy.Name: PreventForceWinNextTurn
AIStrategy.Description: Prevent opponent from using ForceWinNextTurn strategy

AIStrategy.Name: PlayInCornerIfAvailable
AIStrategy.Description: If there are any corner positions available, player there

AIStrategy.Name: SetupForceWinNextTurn
AIStrategy.Description: Check if there's a move which will allow a force win next turn.

AIStrategy.Name: PreventSetupForceWinNextTurn
AIStrategy.Description: Prevent opponent from using SetupForceWinNextTurn strategy

AIStrategy.Name: LearnFromMistakes
AIStrategy.Description: Plays randomly, but keeps track of what moves are made, and learn from mistakes
